name: halloween anon-icons
description:
replaces anon-icons on your dashboard
(not in the inbox)

user.name: brolinskeep
user.about: april 2015: for unknown reasons some of the background pics in my themes have been deleted or whatever. im trying to fix it, so if you notice a bg pic missing, please let me know on my tumblr :) if you have any questions/problems with one of my themes, please contact me on my tumblr

additional_info:
if you want to use YOUR OWN ICON, the pic should/has to be 40px x 40px
otherwise it won't be displayed correctly!!


thx for code to: http://ohnemitleid.tumblr.com/post/61210990613/anonymous-avatar-dashboard-only-the-css-make
